title.value: AU Residential Aged Care Service Identifier

publisher.value: Health Level Seven Australia (Patient Administration WG)

description.value: This identifier profile defines a residential aged care service identifier (RACS Id) (sometimes referred to as a residential aged care facility service identifier (RACF Id) in an Australian context. RACS Ids are assigned by the Department of Health to residential aged care services subsidised by the Australian Government.

copyright.value: HL7 AustraliaÂ© 2018+; Licensed Under Creative Commons No Rights Reserved.

short.value: Residential Aged Care Service Identifier (RACS Id)

definition.value: Residential Aged Care Service Identifier (RACS Id) assigned by the Department of Health to a residential aged care service subsidised by the Australian Government.
